doc:
Richard Ruccolo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Ruccolo 0 Richard Robert Ruccolo (born March 2, 1972) is an American television and film actor, best known for his lead role in the sitcom Two Guys and a Girl (originally titled Two Guys, a Girl and a Pizza Place). Richard_Robert_Ruccolo ( born March_2_,_1972 ) is an_American_television_and_film_actor , best_known for his_lead_role in the_sitcom Two_Guys and a_Girl ( originally_titled Two_Guys , a_Girl and a_Pizza_Place ) .
